title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Language Education Design Utilizing Service-Oriented Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and intermediate-level understanding of language learning
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply language learning content (listening, speaking, reading, writing) holistically using service-based web workflows
Learners can design an optimized learning environment for specific language tasks (e.g., role-playing, translation projects) by assembling modular tools.
Learners can understand Shibboleth authentication-based interoperability systems and implement language learning scenarios utilizing diverse information channels (voice, text, images).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
